amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that the EPA can continue to protect the American people from adverse effects of global climate change.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 112-54 to ensure the EPA Administrator can protect the public health in case of public health emergency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 257 (Roll no. 237).
